attributes.action: include children with aen in human rights act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: provision for children with aen is poor as recognised by unicef. problems exist with diagnosis,preschool provision,healtrh authourities not fulfilling their statutory duties,the closure of special schools,exclusions,speech and language,occupational therapy and a lack of access to specialist soliciters.even david cameroon has been forced to pay privately for speech and language therapy and ruth kelley has taken the option of private provision. parents and professionals,and relatives should unite behind this petition to force the government to recognise the human rights of the most vunerable members of society.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
